message: Hello! Welcome to our little town in the woods. I hope you found us well?

message: Is there anything else I can help you with?

replies.text: Where can I find a place to rest?
Are there any merchants in this town?
Is there anything interesting in the area?

message: Here you go. Enjoy your new outfit!
Over in the southwest, we have an inn with a few rooms. You can ask there. Their beds are very comfortable I heard.
Your broth... And... no. I have definetely never heard that name. Absolutely not.
Yes. We have Fancor, our town's smith, in the north. If you need clothing, you can visit Lynn to the west.
Oh, there is certainly. Apart from our town of course, you might have seen a small castle to the west.
Speak to the Officer!
The sticky cobwebs are forming a wall, keeping out any intruder like you.
*yawn* Oh, kid! This is no place to be. We are very busy right now.
Heyo young buddy. Ready for an adventure, huh?

replies.text: Yeah! And that cave there will be my next one.
Absolutely. But right, now I just need to get some dead spiders.

message: Sure. Wait here, I'll get it for you.
Here you go. Enjoy!
If my wife asks where I am, tell her that I have to cut down two more trees today.

[sharpening his axe]

I've had this axe for decades now. But in the past weeks it keeps getting dull again and again.
[chopping wood]
What did you say?

replies.text: I better get out of here...

message: Do you see this cloud over there? It is a dragon! Or maybe a sheep with wings.
My father told me Feygard isn't real, it's just made up to scare us.
...and is not edible. These mushrooms are most commonly found in the savannah in the southwest corner of Dhayavar.
They are always found in groups of three and the biggest one has a red dot on it's hat like this... [poorly draws a group of mushrooms on the board]
Race you to the well! Last one there smells like cabbage!
Here you go. Enjoy!
Here you go. Enjoy your new outfit!
We don't have much work right now, so I can relax a bit.

replies.text: I am glad to hear that.

message: I have something else that I want to give you instead. It is an old amulet I once found in the forest. Maybe you will like it. And feel free to visit your little friend whenever you like.
This brings tears to my eyes. Thank you so much.
Do you think? Well, indeed we need a lot to run this service.

replies.text: Just kidding. I want the gold.
I imagine. I want to donate my reward to you.

message: Here you go. Enjoy your new outfit!

message: I felt a bit sick this morning, but now that I've eaten something, I'm feeling better. The food here is like medicine to me.

replies.text: I know how to do this.

message: Please go to my staff, she can give you details.

replies.text: I had no choice but to kill it. I'm sorry.

message: Oh no, are you alright? Are you hurt?

message: Good luck with it.

For your effort in helping us, we want to reward you with some gold.

replies.text: Oh great, just what I love the most.

Oh thank you, but I am sure you need the gold more than I do.

message: Oh, it's alright. In fact, I am glad that he doesn't roam around any longer. He was not just hurting you, but all the other animals as well.
No way! Lynn must have been so angry.
Yeah, but as I said, it is of no use anymore. The mixture is worn off. I could barely get out of this cave, so it won't be of much use to you anymore.

message: [Listening to the teacher]

message: I see. You are a wise adventurer. Knowing your limits.

Apart from that, there is a hunter's cabin towards the east. I think somebody lives there, but I am not sure.
It was just after we have settled here, in Moeston. This town as well has been ruins to some extend, but we decided to rebuild some of the houses.
It is also one of the paths towards the plateau area on the mountain, if you want to visit that. But beware of the snakes, I've heard they are very aggressive.
This was a proper castle back in the days. You know, real knights and everything. They rose at the same time as Guynmart, roughly.
Oh, don't mind Marael over there. She is just a little weird sometimes.
Many years ago, Feygard came along and rebuilt the castle as their outpost to have better control over trade and traffic happening on the river.
What a lovely day it is.
The important part about this word is its form when used in a progressive sentence.
At one point, they got into some trouble with their neighbour castle and got attacked. After only a few days, the castle got mostly destroyed, leaving behind ruins for decades.
